text: The 2004 FIBA U16 European Championship Division C was held in Andorra la Vella, Andorra, from 20 to 24 July 2004. Five teams participated in the competition. ==Participating teams== * (hosts) * * * * ==Standings== Category:2003–04 in European basketball FIBA Europe Under-16 Championship Category:July 2004 sports events in Europe Category:FIBA U16 European Championship Division C
title: 2004 Under-16 European Promotion Cup for Men
